title: Why is local radio station 99.9 FM not coming in as clearly as it once did?
text:
In
the previous post, I forgot to append this
link:http://www.myreporter.com/?p=3699



There don't appear to be any problems with the radio station, but

this is a time of year when sunspot activity is higher, and it can

affect reception of radio waves. More here:

http://www.spacescience.com/
